description:
TapWatch is a simple and beautiful stopwatch for webOS that makes timing a joy.

Tap anywhere to start and stop, or double tap while a timer is running to start a new lap. Swipe to the left to view your 50 most recent times.

* Keep your eye on what you are timing: your screen will stay awake as long as TapWatch is active and a timer is running.

* Time comfortably: the whole screen is a button, so no hovering over small targets

* Check progress with a glance: the timer is big, high contrast, and alone on the screen, allowing you to check the elapsed time or the time on your current lap with a glance. While running laps, the total time and your four previous laps are also tastefully displayed in smaller text.

* Multitask: timers will continue timing in the background, even if you close the app.

* Scales wonderfully: time anything, whether it lasts tenths of a second or hours.

* Exhibition mode: use while docked on a touchstone

* Optimized for all webOS devices: buy once and use it on your Pre, Pre2, Pre3, Pixi, Veer, or TouchPad (requires using the same webOS account on all devices)

HELP & SUPPORT

Ridiculously good support is part of the package; if you feel anything is missing or not working properly please email support@onecrayon.com

If you enjoy TapWatch, try out TapNote, my deluxe Dropbox text editor for webOS.
